userPromptForThisRevision: Website for my new resturant in Manhatten, Bella Italia, with a menu and some deals for happy hour. 5 images for now.

imageAssets.description: An inviting, warm interior shot of an upscale Italian restaurant. Focus on cozy lighting, maybe a few blurred patrons in the background, and details like wine bottles or rustic decor. The style should be slightly cinematic and high-quality.

A close-up, mouth-watering shot of a classic Italian pasta dish, like spaghetti carbonara or tagliatelle bolognese, beautifully plated. Steam or slight motion blur could add to the realism. Focus on texture and color.

A vibrant, delicious image of a traditional Italian pizza, perhaps a Margherita or a pizza with fresh toppings, shown hot out of the oven or ready to serve. Emphasize melted cheese and fresh ingredients.
imageAssets.purpose: Another image for the Menu section.

imageAssets.description: A stylish composition showing a selection of Italian appetizers (antipasti) or desserts, like bruschetta, arancini, or tiramisu and cannoli, arranged artfully on a dark background or rustic table.
imageAssets.purpose: Image for the Happy Hour or About Us section.

imageAssets.description: An exterior view of 'Bella Italia' restaurant, subtly showing a Manhattan street scene or architectural element in the background, suggesting its location. The restaurant facade should look welcoming and authentic Italian.
imageAssets.purpose: Image for the Contact or About Us section, or another spot in the layout.
